TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Unit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示长度度量。

span.span: Represents a length measurement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示可以用任何 HTML 兼容的大小单位表示的长度度量。The structure represents a length measurement that can be expressed in any HTML-compatible size unit. 枚举列出可以表示的度量单位。The enumeration lists the units of measurement that can be represented. 由属性如`BorderWidth`和`Height`来表示的长度或宽度的属性。The is used by properties such as `BorderWidth` and `Height` to represent the length or width of the property. 例如，你可以设置到 Web 服务器控件的属性表示 5 个像素。For example, you can set the property of a Web Server control to a that represents five pixels. > [!NOTE] > 类可以表示仅在-32768 到 32767 之间的值。The class can represent values only between -32768 and 32767. 使用属性来确定度量值的长度。Use the property to determine the length of the measurement. 使用确定的度量单位属性。The unit of measurement is determined using the property. 你可以将其他数据类型转换使用， ， ，和方法。You can convert other data types to a by using the , , , and methods. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有控件都支持所示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例结构使用指定的双精度浮点数。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified double precision floating point number. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||由 `value` 指定的值。The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果`value`是不介于-32768 到 32767 之间，会引发异常。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

span.span: is not between -32768 and 32767.

param.span: 表示 的长度的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the length of the .

summary.span: 用指定的长度初始化 结构的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the specified length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例结构使用指定的长度。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified length. 在两个部分，长度的值和长度的单位类型中指定了长度。The length is specified in two parts, the length's value and the length's unit type. 例如，"200 Cm"表示的长度为 200 厘米。For example, "200Cm" represents a length of 200 centimeters. 你可以使用任何有效的 CSS 符合单元表达式。You can use any valid CSS-compliant unit expression. 下表列出了常用的单位类型。The following table lists the common unit types. |单位类型Unit type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Pixel`|以像素为单位的长度。Length in pixels.| |`Point`|以磅为单位的长度。Length in points. 一点表示 1/72 英寸。A point represents 1/72 of an inch.| |`Inch`|以英寸为单位的长度。Length in inches.| |`Mm`|以毫米为单位的长度。Length in millimeters.| |`Cm`|厘米长度。Length in centimeters.| |`Percentage`|长度，作为父元素的百分比。Length as a percentage of the parent element.| 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||中指定的单位类型`value`。The unit type specified in `value`.| ||中指定的值`value`。The value specified in `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果`value`是不介于-32768 到 32767 之间，会引发异常。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 指定的长度不在 -32768 和 32767 之间。

span.span: The specified length is not between -32768 and 32767.

exception.span: 不是符合 CSS 的有效单位表达式。

span.span: is not a valid CSS-compliant unit expression.

param.span: 接口实现，提供区域性特定的格式设置信息。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式提供程序将 转换为等效字符串。

span.span: Converts a to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示由 指定的格式的此 。

span.span: A representing this in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个单元进行格式设置的字符串表示和表示的单位的缩写。The method returns a string representation formatted with a unit and an abbreviation representing the unit . 下表列出值和其相应的缩写。The following table lists values and their corresponding abbreviation. |单位类型Unit type|缩写Abbreviation| |---------------|------------------| ||pxpx| ||ptpt| ||pcpc| ||中的in| ||mmmm| ||cmcm| ||%| ||emem| ||exex| 使用`formatProvider`指定用于设置格式的区域性特定信息。Use `formatProvider` to specify culture-specific information used to format the . 如果`formatProvider`是`null`，使用默认的格式化字符串的数值部分对象设置为当前区域性。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the numeric portion of the string is formatted using a default object set for the current culture.
